author: barnabasbusa
content: Please note that I have added an extra blob schedule that will be triggered with fulu. This will not increase the blob count, but its required by some CLs not to fork away: https://github.com/ethpandaops/fusaka-devnets/commit/c7aaa8caeba8fa9c6d72bf9c76d4df523524e2a7

author: barnabasbusa
content: change has been rolled out on all nodes

author: jtraglia
content:
Two more epochs until Fulu activates on fusaka-devnet-0:
https://dora.fusaka-devnet-0.ethpandaops.io

author: jtraglia
content: Do we know who the unnamed proposers are that are missing slots?

author: parithosh
content: We have a bunch of servers setup in Singapore, but their apt mirror is down and we're not able to bootstrap the servers for the devnet. We've raised an issue, but those are the missing validators (when i eyeball it)

author: parithosh
content: im not sure why the config doesnt include them with labels though - bbusa set it up and can probably give a reason

author: parithosh
content:
There's some forking on fusaka-devnet-0, nimbus is looking into their validators. It would be great if other CLs look into theirs as well.
https://dora.fusaka-devnet-0.ethpandaops.io/slots
